core_principles.principle: Root File Placement Governance (System A, preserved)
core_principles.statement: Only configuration and entry-point files belong in root. Everything else has a designated location.
All configuration, specifications, and governance defined in JSON. Markdown and code auto-generated from JSON.
implications: JSON authorities (project-plan, specifications, governance) are immutable
All .generated/ files auto-generated from JSON sources

core_principles.statement: THIS FILE is the authoritative master. All package-level, directory-level, and project-specific governance inherit from here.

core_principles.statement: No manual files in auto-generation patterns. All enforcement layers prevent manual creation.
Governance rules cascade from repository → package → directory with inheritance and override capability.

policy_statement_unified: From this point forward, the renderx-plugins-demo repository operates under the UNIFIED governance framework combining root file placement (System A) and JSON-driven automation (System B). This file (UNIFIED_GOVERNANCE_AUTHORITY.json) is the authoritative master for all governance. No competing governance systems will be created. All packages and components inherit from this framework. All enforcement layers work together to prevent violations of both systems' rules.

domain_governance.purpose: Establish scalable, lineage-aware domain authorities for processes, workflows, entities, policies, sessions, and orchestration contexts.
principles: Domain JSON is the only authoritative representation of a bounded context.
Markdown reflections under docs/domains/ are auto-generated only.
All domain link resolution requires registration in DOMAIN_REGISTRY.json.
Lineage integrity enforced via deterministic lineage_hash recomputation.
Links to deprecated domains require explicit migration relation_type=extends.

failure_conditions: Schema missing required keys (domain_id, domain_type, provenance)
Link to deprecated domain without migration relation
non_blocking: Missing integrity checksum (allowed until first generation)

inheritance_and_lineage.override_policy: Leaf domain may override non-critical inherited rules but cannot override core_principles or non_overridable governance keys.
inheritance_and_lineage.propagation: Root changes propagate unless domain stability score >=0.9 (frozen).
inheritance_and_lineage.verification: Lineage hash recomputed each validation pass and compared to stored value (if present).

create_when: Workflow spans >2 sprints and crosses team boundaries
Process has enforcement or generation mechanics

governance_alignment.auto_generated_markdown_header: <!-- AUTO-GENERATED DOMAIN DOCUMENT - DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->
governance_alignment.drift_prevention: Manual docs/domains/*.md without JSON authority cause validation failure
